title: [Large-Scale] Short-Term Blended Learning Course for Core Business Administration Competencies: Business Text Analysis and Strategic Expression Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory business administration concepts, understanding of business communication, and ability to interpret professional texts
context.additional_context: Optimizing smartphone-based learning environments for learners with diverse prior knowledge levels. Focuses specifically on business document analysis, specialized terminology application, and presentation skill enhancement.

learning_goals: Learners will analyze five core concepts of accounting principles using real business case texts and explain them using specialized terminology.
Learners can interpret key metrics in financial reports using data analysis tools and express the results in structured text.
Learners can simulate the business strategy development process through team projects and systematically create presentation materials following a logical flow.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
